entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h becoming west 20 late this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10.
